title: Can students upload work to Google Classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, They can upload their classwork to google classroom and also they can get feedback from teachers too. A very useful platform for all three stakeholders ( Students, Teacher and Management ). Online teaching can be monitored and automatically recorded and any time can be checked by the Head of school too in google classroom. For more details please <<click here>>

Yes it is one of the basic processes of Google Classroom. A teacher puts the lesson in and assigns it to those in that class or selected students. Video links, internet links, documents, worksheets, what ever the teacher feels should be given to the student to get their task done is in there. One of the things the teacher may have included would be a worksheet which can be setup so every student gets their own copy. Of course. If they have the correct permissions then that’s the whole point of google classroom is being able to submit their work.
